author: Nintendo of America
description:
Yooka-Replaylee is available now, only on Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/yooka-replaylee-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

The story begins! Join Yooka and Laylee on an epic 3D platforming adventure filled with new moves, more story and more than double the amount of collectibles to uncover. 

#YookaReplaylee #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: Yooka-Replaylee – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Fortnitemares returns to Battle Royale on Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch! Drop in today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/fortnite-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1064-01&utm_id=P1064-01   

Step into your worst nightmare and revel in the terror as Fortnitemares returns to Battle Royale, where exciting new frights and familiar horrors rule. Haunt Spooky Spots, best bosses, and flip the slasher movie script—it’ll be a scream! 

#Fortnite #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Check out some of the new tracks in JUST DANCE 2026 EDITION coming Oct 14, 2025 to Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/just-dance-2026-edition-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1053-01&utm_id=P1053-01  

From the hottest hits to timeless classics, there's a song for everyone and every moment. Dance solo, in co-op, or get competitive and create unforgettable memories with friends and family.  

#JustDance #NintendoSwitch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Three classic Super NES titles will be release on Super Nintendo – Nintendo Classics!

Mario & Wario
Action puzzles abound in this title released only in Japan for the Super Famicom™ system in 1993. Wario has dropped a bucket on poor Mario's head, and now he can't see! So it's up to you to lead Mario safely to Luigi. Use the forest fairy's magic wand to create platforms, change the direction Mario walks, and defeat enemies. You can clear a total of 100 screens full of unique challenges using simple controls—just move the mouse to move the fairy and click the left button once to perform actions.

BUBSY™ in: Claws Encounters of the Furred Kind
Bubsy the bobcat is on the prowl to recover his stolen yarn!

Play as the furr-ocious feline himself in this action title released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System™ in 1993. Bubsy's grand adventure begins when his precious yarn is stolen by a race of yarn-obsessed aliens, the Woolies. Gallivant across 16 total stages, each containing an
title: Super NES – October 2025 Games Update
